Description: Postcard; printed paper; black and white photograph showing an old tree known as the Virgin's Tree at Mataria.
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used but the stamp has been previously soaked off. Message reads: "Gresham House, 10 Sharia Soliman Pacha, Cairo. This is the tree where the Holy Family rested in Egypt - near is a sweet well of water - all [indistinct words] - the only erect obelisk is near on site of ancient city ON. Love M. B." The same individual sent EPH-ME 2978.
